page.title: 08RECREATION.
page.content: { Priory Street Centre}was originally a school,now it is a Sports Centre.It was opened as a school in 1857.The school remained under Methodist management until it was closed in 1948. { Bowls}is a game for two or more players.The idea of the game is to get nearest to the Jack,the white ball.Points are given to the team that has the nearest bowls to the Jack.Only one team can score points at a time. { Dancing.}I do ballet lessons.I am in grade 4 now.I do Latin American and Ballroom dancing.In Latin American we dance to modern records and in Ballroom to old-fashioned.I do drama and Jazz dance.In drama you have to express feelings.Jazz dance is movement to strongly rythmic music.
